name: Himeko Sutori
summary: Himeko Sutori is a tactical, turn-based RPG that combines intimate character development with epic battles featuring hundreds of unique characters. With the included campaign editor, you can make new worlds and new adventures, making Himeko Sutori your story.
info:
• 平台: PC
  • 游玩人数: 1
  • 发行日期: 2019年1月31日
  • 售价: ￥80
  • 官方网站: http://himekosutori.com/
  • 开发商: Rockwell Studios, LLC
  • 发行: Rockwell Studios, LLC
